website_summaries.verdict: A must for thick crust and deep dish pizza lovers. This beast of a pizza cutter will slice through just about anything.
pros: Incredibly versatile with an extra large design that's suitable for cakes, brownies, pastries, and any type of pizza
Slices quickly and easily with minimal effort
Includes sheath for blade and finger protection
cons: A bulky item, this cutter takes up considerable drawer space

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but very soft steel. Edge was dinged when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this, the package was undamaged. However the edge of the cutter had several dings as if it had been hit against a sharp corner of something hard. I sharpen knives on the side and have the tools to correctly sharpen about anything. After a very light sanding to remove the dings, I applied my buffer. The buffer wheel actually created a bur on the steel which tells me that the steel is very soft, but easy to sharpen. The cutter works very well and if I only use it on my poly cutting board, I should not have to sharpen for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Doctordun

customer_reviews.title: Having read reviews that stated it could have burrs I ...
customer_reviews.text: Having read reviews that stated it could have burrs I ran a stone over the blade as soon as I got it. The reviews also said it was flexible but I find it to be as rigid as my heavy knives and not flexible. I would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but could use more weight
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a wheel cutter, I decided to try this style. This device is MUCH easier to keep clean than the former and is large enough to get the job done. I like to make 15" pizzas a few times per week so this size fits the bill just fine. A bit more weight would make cutting easier, but the simple, one-piece design makes clean-up effortless. I've modified mine with a hole in one end to keep it hung up near my work bench for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: david nespoli

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Great for pizza, however, use it for Texas toast when making more than one or two items, and fantastic for cutting stubborn items like sweet potatoes for fries or butternut squash. Reduces the chance of the kids having an accident with a knife when they help out. Very stable on tough to cut foods. Keeps an edge too! Goes from drawer to cutting board to sink and back to drawer almost daily! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Crump

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this cutter. It's the perfect size for our homemade pizzas and It's plenty sharp so it cuts right through the toppings and crust. The sharpness of the blade brings up the first of two features that we feel set this cutter apart. It comes with a blade sheath. I don't think I've seen any others that come with one. It fits nice and snug so it stays on while in our utensil drawer. The other feature we like is that the handle and blade are one piece so there's nothing that will come apart or loosen up. This design also makes for easy cleaning. Don't think we could be happier with this cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: Pizza Cutter, where have you been all my life? I've bought regular circular pizza cutters and inevitably the top comes out of the handle, they rust, or just plain don't cut great. I bought this bad boy and I LOVE IT. Works to cut so many things quickly and efficiently. I use for pizza, waffles, sandwiches, panini's....uber fast, clean cuts. And with kids in the house, I feel good that it has a guard to store it in when not using. My fav pizza cutter ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jettmom3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Functional but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The gauge (thickness) of the metal is on the thinner side which lends to bowing and bending when applying pressure and gripping. It handles the job but would be better if was weighted more and had less flex. Having used a more robust commercial version, I find this retail model flimsy and unstable. That said, it works and is far superior to a pizza roll slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly Rapids

customer_reviews.title: Cutting just got easier...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cutter! I have a hard time using my hands sometimes and this makes it much easier than the typical pizza cutters. Very sharp and I LOVE that it has a storage sleeve (hard plastic) for added safety.
customer_reviews.author: kjsddasa

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good quality, great price, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to ditch the pizza wheel. As a former employee of a pizza restaurant, it's amazing I haven't bought a pizza cutter like this years ago. I just got it mine today and already used it. Brings me back to cutting pizza in the restaurant. So easy to use, doesn't mess up the toppings. One smooth motion per cut. No rolling back and forth with a dull wheel. I also like this because if and when I need to sharpen, it will be super easy to sharpen. Th blade cover is a great so I won't worry about slicing myself grabbing it out of the drawer. Good quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Easy and even pizza cutting!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this pizza cutter. For over 40 years I have always relied on a wheel type pizza cutter. Well this has pizza liberated me I just don’t know how I have gotten along without it. This takes the job of the even pizza cutting to a new level. We all know what I mean there is always those couple pieces that end up being a sliver... well this makes my life so much easier when you get the first cut accurate the rest just fall into place. Cleans up nicely and feels nice in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: grdane2000

customer_reviews.title: What can't you use this thing for?
customer_reviews.text: Cut, celery, cilantro, pizza, cheese, scallions, onions, lift a dang pie crust off the counter, cut a dang pie crust on a counter, slice rolls, I mean, go crazy with this dang thing, and if someone breaks in your house and sneaks up on you, make a run for this pizza cutter and wield this rockin' blade as a weapon. . . . but be sure to remove the protective blade covering first.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My partner has been wanting one of these forever. No, he didn't come straight out and say, "Hey, I want one." The hints were enough. I did my research and found this one. The price is reasonable. The blade is sharp and cuts easily. The handle is easy to grasp. No problem cleaning. Storage is great with the holder. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza cutter for quality and price point
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect stocking stuffer for my boyfriend. He was cutting with a wheeled pizza cutter one night when the thing broke and he said “Oh crap” as it spun across the table. This cutter is stainless and washed well in the dishwasher. The blade protector is high quality and I do not see it cracking any time soon. The blade is sharp and cuts a perfect line every time. I liked it so much that I ordered one for myself. It is much more user friendly than any wheeled cutter, plus it can be used for chopping other items like vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: LaurBuys2Much

customer_reviews.title: works well for cutting up pizza
customer_reviews.text: This is sized just right for the pizzas i cook on my average size 15" stone. I would buy a bigger one if you're cutting store-bought 16"+ pizzas The blade cover works well to protect the edge (and your fingers) I don't think this is super high quality knife steel, but it doesn't rust, discolor, or pit and the edge is very adequate for cutting up pizza, including some of the more durable toppings like thick-sliced pepperoni.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is absolutely amazing! Its dishwasher safe which makes clean up a breeze! It's also incredibly sharp (as it should be) and cuts even thicker crust in one movement. I love the size, as it is small enough to fit in one of my kitchen drawers but big enough that it can cut through a small or medium pizza with no problem. Definitely keep the blade cover though- you wouldn't want little hands to get ahold of this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This Pizza Cutter Rocker from Checkered Chef
customer_reviews.text: We should have ordered this a long time ago. Very high-quality product definitely handles the job for all types of pizzas, especially for deep-dish pizzas . You can use this cutter for pies, cakes, etc.. I rinse it off real good, put it in the dishwasher and immediately remove it before the drying cycle starts. Then I hand-dry it and let it sit out for about an hour so it throughly dries inside the handle before I put it away. I want it to last a long time, this is why I go through the extra effort. It's sharp so be careful and I hope you enjoy it as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like a boss!
customer_reviews.text: You ever just need a quick pick me up? Like a quick boost in confidence? Then you need this pizza cutter. I always just whip it out like Thanos about to fight the Avengers in Endgame and I make that pizza cry as I quickly seesaw this blade through. In mere seconds, you'll feel like you conquered an army! Your friends will gasp in awe as you claim your kill aka the pizza that you baked. So do yourself a favor and grab this bad boy right now!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than a wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why we ever had a pizza cutter before. We like making our own pizzas on the grill. Lots of toppings there. The problem with that is that you end up with a crispy crust and lots of toppings that smoosh around with a wheel. This thing handles the pizza like a champ. All of the toppings stay in place, and the slices are easier to cut more evenly too. This blade seems super sharp and I love that it comes with the blade cover. No more being scared to put my hand in the knife drawer. I will buy this again when this one wears out which I'm thinking won't be for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hill country love

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size
customer_reviews.text: This is my first one. In the future, I would get a longer one. This is 14inch. If pizza is over 12 inches, it’s harder to cut because you need to pick it up and move it from one side to the other. We usually always get Aldi pizza so they are at least 14 inches. This blade did not come very sharp, so it has not provided a clean cut from the beginning. I do like the blade cover.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoMom

customer_reviews.title: Bad Edge / Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I got a bad one or not. With so many good reviews I took a chance. However, like others have reported, there are little bits of metal / burrs on what looks like a very un-refined edge. This doesn't look safe to use. I may try sharpening it. Seems like poor quality control to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!
customer_reviews.text: Homemade pizzas every Friday night called for a good cutter. This one is impressive. Sharp and easy to hold. Cuts cleanly and washes up great in the dishwasher. Wish I had bought this a long time ago instead of our little dinky pizza cutter that we've held onto for way too long. The toppings stay on the pizza with this since it's one clean cut across each time.
customer_reviews.author: lizzieo

customer_reviews.title: So many uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing for everything. It's perfect for cutting pizzas, but also for sandwiches, fruit, veggies, toast, quesadillas, even Debbie snack cakes lol its pretty much taken the place of every knife in my house except for the steak & butter knife. By far one of the best purchases I've made and worth the money 100%. East to clean and made of good material.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Claunch

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool!
customer_reviews.text: Not just for pizza. I wish I had purchased this earlier. Great for pizza of course but also great for chopping herbs (better than the herb cutting scissors with the multiple cutters) used for chopping fresh spinach recently. I really like this cutter. I plan to buy another as a gift it's a wonderful addition to your kitchen supplys.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: great for home made pizza
customer_reviews.text: we replaced an older one very similar to this one. this one however, is even nicer. love the fact it comes with the sleeve. it is more durable then the last. the last one, a different company, the center of the blade bent. I also run this one in the dishwasher. not sure if it is really meant to, but it still works great after a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Cross

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good pizza cutter that is efficient and simple to use. Cuts pizza way faster than a rolling knife, does not collect pizza toppings like a rolling knife, no need to make sure the pizza doesn't slide around like with a rollings knife, and can be put into the dishwasher as is. I just wish the steel would be thicker. It's not really flimsy but on the verge of being flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Too much work, not enough reward!
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Not as thrilled as I expected to be, after reading rave reviews on here before purchasing... It's big, with a large blade exposed - which is quite sharp (again, based on reviews, although I've not run my finger across it myself yet, to see). Unfortunately, for its size and sharpness, it still doesn't seem to slice thru a pizza any better really than my regular ol' handheld roller pizza cutter. Which is far smaller, less dangerous and much easier to use, clean and store...
customer_reviews.author: Karla JM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent One Cut Knife for Every Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen knife to the moon and back! I love using this tool to cut everything from sourdough focaccia, pizza to brownies! Makes cutting crispy crusts a snap in a single slice! This is a valuable tool at an honest price at the time of my purchase. I would recommend this tool to anyone looking for a broad rocker blade!
customer_reviews.author: ICUfree2

customer_reviews.title: Use caution!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo sharp! Use caution! Especially when replacing the sheath back on. I got tired of cutting my pizzas with a chef knife. I love that I can just rock this once and its cut through!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Christian

customer_reviews.title: Very great pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.text: The cutter arrived in good condition and looks great. I've used it for cutting pizzas and it works great. I also used it to cut a roll of dough to make cinnamon rolls. It works great there also. It has a good feel in the hands and is very well made and extra sharp. The only problem I've had is finding a place to store it when not in use since it is large.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for slicing pizza, but it is a little too long for my pizza pan. I have to remove it and put it on a cutting mat in order to use this the right way. You can leave it in the pan and the cut one end and move it over and cut the other end, but that is a hassle. Wish it was just a little shorter. Be careful though, it is very sharp as when I went to clean it, I sliced my finger!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good tool to have in kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my smaller traditional pizza cutters get dull and would not cut my pizzas and flatbreads. This cutter is easy to use and easy to clean. I have put it in the dishwasher and it is fine, just make sure you drain the water that is left in the hollow handle.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.Thurman

customer_reviews.title: A very simple well made pizza cutter! Very sharp and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this pizza cutter based on a review done by someone that sharpen knives for a living and was impressed with it! I was a little concerned that at least one of the reviews said it was flimsy! I find that far from the truth! I think it is made very well! And it does a terrific job cutting the pizza! I definitely intend to hand wash it as I do all my knives! I think it was a good investment and I'm glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth it for Pizza
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for a fantastic price. I got this for my fiancé when we moved into our first hole together as a surprise and this thing is fantastic. We were originally planning to put a super expensive one on our wedding registry, but this has completely changed our minds.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Cutter
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a pizza cutter challenged with the standard round wheel cutter. This cutter has been great and you just rock it from one edge of the pizza to the other. It is all one piece so it is easy to clean. It also fits down the side of the kitchen drawer pretty easily. A win win for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Regina C.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous edge damage!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this. Purchased thinking it would be nice than the old small one we've had for many years and is chipped. Boy was I wrong! Not one, but 2 came damaged right out of the box!! Sending both back. Now they aren't even available! Figures. Watch out!
customer_reviews.author: My ARTasticSelfTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome on a head of lettuce!
customer_reviews.text: We have use this cutter on pizzas all the time works great! No issues at all! We wanted to see if it would cut anything else pretty good and it does slice a head of lettuce really nicely! Haven't tried it on anything else... maybe a watermelon next, who knows?! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bellemore

customer_reviews.title: Sharp product
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza cutter! Easy to use and very sharp, like that it has a blade protector cover. Goes right through the thickest pizza without dragging the toppings like the wheel cutters do. Easy to hold rolled handle, careful...blade is sharp!
customer_reviews.author: flowfl

customer_reviews.title: Pizza anyone?
customer_reviews.text: We bake a lot of pizza at home and it is so useful and works much better then the Butcher Block knife I normally use. It is sharp and I recommend you keep it in a separate drawer with its sheave on to prevent injury if there are any children in your home
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Coats

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Very easy to use on all foods from pizza, cutting sandwiches and cutting fruits and vegetables. It also looks very impressive in my kitchen because I have it hanging under my cabinet and wgen friends ir family come by they are like "What the heck is that it looks cool" I highly recommend this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it cuts pizza.
customer_reviews.text: “Safety features”, really? If you can’t use this safely, might want to excuse yourself from the kitchen. It cuts our home made pizzas with no moving parts to break like the little wheel cutters do.
customer_reviews.author: Inq

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This pizza cutter is fun and works great. My husband insists on cutting our homemade pizza "Chicago" style (in squares not pie) and this works great for that. Sharp and easy to use and clean. Shipping was quick and seller was courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Sheer Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Great to cut pizza
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have used it many times sense I started cooking my own pizzas at home. Easy to use easy to clean very sturdy product. Solid construction. So far I have several friends that just bought one sense they like how this one feels.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Huskey

customer_reviews.title: great pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: not just for pizza - this rocker pizza cutter is so easy to use! Make for quick and easy slices as we made homemade pizzas on the smoker. not only did it slice pizza but helped with the prep too! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Angst

customer_reviews.title: A Good Pizza Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Using the rolling disc blade to cut pizza worked, but some times it wouldn't completely cut the bread under the pizza without several attempts. The rocker blade cuts straighter and more thoroughly with less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Histiletto

customer_reviews.title: Makes cutting pizza easy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pizza cutter. It makes pizza slicing fast and mess free. For some reason when I've used a pizza wheel, it always pushed the toppings all over the place and I had to saw the crust to get it to cut through (even with a brand new wheel). This device solves those problems nicely. Just push down and rock and you've quickly got your pizza cut into neat slices.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cover,  great cutter
customer_reviews.text: Love my pizza cutter, however, the cover has split in half. I had to toss it. It arrived looking a bit weathered, but I loved the actual cutter so much, I didn't return it. Now, I'm angry at myself because I NEED a cover!!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: We had the old type of wheel pizza cutter and it was getting dull. I researched new ones and decided to go with this one. It is the perfect size for all types of pizza and cuts them all easily. We've used ours many times. It cleans easily and the blade cover is great for storage in a drawer. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: You have to use some muscle, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: I had two of the roller kind break. So I thought this would be the answer. It is sharp, and it works well but you have to put some muscle behind it. My mother isn’t strong enough to make it cut through.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J. Field

customer_reviews.title: The best invention for cutting pizza (and other stuff!)
customer_reviews.text: This blade is amazingly sharp and slices right through the pizza or bars or brownies and cuts so clean that you don't end up with a bunch of crumbs and don't have to fight the pizza crust. Best money I've spent for a pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona J. Golding

customer_reviews.title: Machete-sized cutter works great
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is very solid and looks like it will last for several lifetimes. There’s nothing to break. Now I won’t have to buy any more pizza cutters (which always break!). With adequate pressure and a sturdy cutting surface this thing cuts right through the thickest of pies.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like a professional pizza cutter! 👩‍🍳
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza cutter! It's super easy to hold and easily cuts through any type of food - fruits, pizza crust, dough, chocolate, etc. Cleans very easily too, my old pizza cutter used to get cheese and sauce stuck between the blade and plastic so it would be such a pain to clean. Now it's super easy to quickly wash it since it doesnt have any nooks or crannies to hide food in. It's so easy to just hold with both hands and cut swiftly through pizza, it reminds me of the cutters pizza places use. Definitely recommend buying! The price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Failure to cut through crust
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept and I know this type of pizza cutter is used in professional kitchens, but it will not cut through a cooked pizza crust. Extremely disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: C Buck

customer_reviews.title: Reinventing the wheel
customer_reviews.text: For the 40 years I have made pizza, I have used a rolling pizza wheel to cut them. This thing is superior. Easy quick straight - professional. (Shout out to Breville, whose pizza oven is amazing. Breville makes the crispy crust, and this thing cuts it perfectly.)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pizza Lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband regularly makes homemade pizza. This is makes it super easy to cut the pizzas with one cut across the pizza for each wedge. We have also used it for dicing vegetables. The edge is sharp and can be sharpened later if we need to. The plastic edge cover keeps protects the edge and fingers when it is in our utensil drawer. Great buy. I would order this as gift for others. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for cutting pizzas and since the blade is so sharp it’s useful for a lot more. Just be careful because it is a lot sharper than most pizza cutters. Pampered Chef quality IMO
customer_reviews.author: MAAUF-IA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cutter!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it was fantastic the way it cut my pizza! I will never go back to a round cutting tool. It is very sharp and was easy to clean. I like the blade protector as well. It is a good value! I’m going to purchase another one for my work! I have written other reviews when asked by companies, but this is my first voluntary review because I think it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Janice L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and sharp. I like that it’s all one piece rather than having a handle attached that can get crud under it or wear out. I use a bottle washer to clean inside the “handle”.
customer_reviews.author: jcam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've ever bought, it makes cutting my homemade pizzas so much easier then a traditional pizza cutter. My only complaint is that it doesn't have an actual handle or guard to hold onto, so your fingers get dangerously close to the hot pizza sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Soma

customer_reviews.title: Well Engineered
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the usually rolling cutter that I had. It's actually good looking too. I like the fact that it is easy to clean and ties in the dishwasher. If I needed to sharpen it, the design makes it easy. It also comes with a guard to protect the edge and prevent accidents. Works way better than the rolling cutter. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing though
customer_reviews.text: This big guy is much larger than I was expecting in regards to the handle along the top. I love this thing though. It cuts everything with such ease & I only have to do it once. I don't have to repeatedly apply pressure in the same place to make the crust break apart. Always happens on the first try with this cutter! LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Louwho

customer_reviews.title: Best way to cut pizza.
customer_reviews.text: Item has good feel and cuts very well and quickly. Always used a roller blade previously but difficult to clean sauce and cheese out of all areas. You clean this as easily and quickly as a knife. This appears to be excellent for personal use and possibly commercial as well but I don't use it enough to assess that. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Z

customer_reviews.title: Not just a pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Because of the rocking motion, it is easier to see that the crust is completely cut through, and the toppings don't pull to the side or off the slice. So much better than a traditional pizza cutter, also I find I use this for cutting other things - like hot french/garlic bread from the oven, chopping vegetables, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and very sharp, easily cleaned in the dishwasher. Quick to use for even slices as long as you do your part. Not overpriced like some others. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eyler

customer_reviews.title: It's small
customer_reviews.text: This curved blade is sharpened on one side. I measured end to end to be just under 14". Overall the construction feels professional quality. Because of it's small size I will be using it to cut sandwiches in a professional environment. I will not use this blade in a dishwasher, but I don't see any issue. It's one solid piece of metal. The protective sheath is plastic. For the price it's a nice kitchen gadget. I get a nice clean cut on my BLT's.
customer_reviews.author: Master of the Universe

customer_reviews.title: Should work fine
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a sturdy product and it's deft sharp enough. The only thing keeping it from 5 stars is I thought the handle was a solid piece but it's actually hollow. The whole this is a thin metal which is rolled at the end to make the handle. Don't think it'll mess with the performance and it's only a minor gripe but the pictures sure didn't let on that it wasn't a solid handle.
customer_reviews.author: BHurk7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Great cutter. Cuts a large pizza and a thick cheesecake with ease. The cover is definitely a plus as it’s sharp. Handle is large enuff that the kiddo can use it safely.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beet pizza cutter ever
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s weird to get excited about a pizza cutter but this is an exception. I LOVE this knife. So easy to clean, large enough to make just one cut per slice and funnily enough everyone who comes to our house wants to use it when we make pizza (weird right?) 😂
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job Well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cutter. I had bought 4 others and he kept using my good kitchen knives. When I bought his this cutter, he has not touched my good knives. I'm happy and he's happy! It does the job and cleans up easy, just put it into the dishwasher. Love it! I would send a photo but, it is always in use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Veneskey

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: This pizza slicer is so much nicer than the typical wheel slicers. The blade is sharp and it is easy to use, nice and sturdy and good quality. I am trying to think of all the things I can cut and chop with this handy tool.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie W

customer_reviews.title: Blade is already sharp! Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was nice and secure. Use it and really appreciate the sturdiness and easy u to use blade. Not only for cutting pizza...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts even the thickest crust and a clean cut! Takes a couple uses to get a handle on it but it is sharp and way better then wheel cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Cutter By Far
customer_reviews.text: Love using my pizza cutter. Very easy to use and clean. High quality has gone into this product and I would recommend to anyone wanting an easy way to cut their own pizza.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well as a rolling cutter
customer_reviews.text: We make pizzas almost every Sunday night and our old pizza cutter recently broke. I ordered this rocker blade style cutter as a replacement, however I am going to go back to the old roller type. This rocker blade doesn't cut pizza nearly as well and it is hard to clean as water collects in the top handle.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the product!! Arrived with sturdy packaging and super sharp. It goes through pizza like a dream and large enough to go through an entire med pizza At one time. Makes short work of Chopping things like herbs, onion peppers & tomatoes. Would absolutely purchase again for myself as well as for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Can not cut through pancakes or pizza wish it was a commercial cutter
customer_reviews.author: dawn woehler

customer_reviews.title: Makes pizza cutting easy!
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this, I used an 8" chefs knife to cut my pizza. This works way better. I like it and use it every pizza night.
customer_reviews.author: TheWinemaker99336

customer_reviews.title: Not what we like
customer_reviews.text: We used this to replace another cutter. It doesn't have the teeter totter effect like our previous one. It is almost a flat cut from side to side. It work ok Just not as quick and clean cutting as our other one.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for slicing pizzas super fast and without tearing them.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this along with our Ooni pizza oven. This is a game changer for slicing pizza quickly and efficiently. The blade is very sharp and it easily glides through the Neapolitan dough we made. If you are making lots of pizzas, this is a really helpful accessory! Normal pizza wheels can tear your toppings. This leaves every slice looking perfect. It's easy to clean and comes with a sturdy sleeve to protect the sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Klein

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: great product. easy to use. easy to clean. and don't order another brand if it doesn't come with a blade guard for storage. that is a must.
customer_reviews.author: DEEVCO

customer_reviews.title: Pizza rocker
customer_reviews.text: We have a pizza rocker at work and I love how it does not disturb the toppings as much as the rolling wheel cutters. I added this one to my cart and when I realized it was the same brand as the one at work I ordered it. I couldn't be happier and now I know just how dull the one at work had gotten over the many years of use in comparison to the one I just received. If that one is still working great after all that time I know this one will last as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ken N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. Have arthritis in hands. This tool makes mincing vegetables and herbs a breeze, without requiring hand strength. Get a little higher than cutting board and use upper body strength to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: megomole

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought. This is great for smaller pizzas, but if you have a large one, expect to make 2 slices to get through one cut.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Stop what your doing, read no further and buy this now.
customer_reviews.text: If you are using the wheel cutter, stop, stop right now and buy this. I get far more use out of this than just cutting pizza. I use it to cut many food items. It’s nice, durable and sharp as a Ninjas blade. What are you waiting for, but one now.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Varnell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, love love this
customer_reviews.text: Every one who cooks pizza should have this. Amazing. Makes it so much easier than the usual smaller roller cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza cutter. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this rocking pizza cutter. I’ve wanted one for ages. The wheel is a pain, this is so easy to use! Easy to clean. Great size - frozen pizzas or homemade, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne King

customer_reviews.title: No dishwasher, hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: Do not under any circumstances put into the dishwasher, it dulled the edge enough to make the pizza stick to the blade. Once I reshaped the edge it has worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: I think I just got a bad one, replacement product was great!
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great product for the price my only issue is when I unpacked it the blade has little ding marks on it like it had been hit with a hammer seems cheapy, the company got in contact and sent a new pizza cutter and it showed up perfect no dings at all thank you!
customer_reviews.author: j.a.

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Pizza, Garlic bread, danish anything I want to cut. Easy to clean and very very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: GA G'ma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool for the money. I use it everyday, it’s really sharp. Easy to clean, and it has its own sheath to protect the blade. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Santandres

customer_reviews.title: No More Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Fabulous. Better than I had thought, with the protector and handle. Wheels Be Gone.
customer_reviews.author: 2xist

customer_reviews.title: Extra sturdy blade which slices through pizza like it's a hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Extra sturdy blade which slices through pizza like it's a hot knife through butter. Has a handle which doesn't slip out of your hand and is super easy to use with minimal effort. Cover for the blade keeps it sharp and out of the way so you don't cut your hand open getting it out of the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: We were a bit disappointed in this pizza slicer. It is basically a one piece of metal with it rolled on top to make a handle. It does have a blade guard, but it isn't sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy of 7

customer_reviews.title: Jagged blade
customer_reviews.text: The blade looked great with its cover, but as soon as I removed the cover the blade was jagged toward the middle. It's like someone took it and banged it against something. It was not a smooth blade. Too bad I was really looking forward to use it. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Ricupero

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pizza cutter but I love it for so many reasons. It helps cut down on my prep time because I also use it for cutting up vegetables. Very easy to grip, easy clean up. I know it should go without saying but, be careful as it is extremely sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Moneek Small

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Better and way cooler than any normal pizza roller cutter. Plus it just feels way more bada**. I would recommend this to anyone looking to slice some food :)
customer_reviews.author: MidwestGent

customer_reviews.title: nice but needs a little work
customer_reviews.text: great size for my pizza and love the rocker cutting motion, but the cutter is not finished on the blade and will leave metal shards in your food if you don't finish the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as the dickins making cutting pizza easy and effortless. One piece construction also means it can be dish washer cleaned. Would recommend over any other rotating blade type slicer
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to use on my deep dish Chicago pizzas! Cuts really clean. Nice and sharp. Love that it comes with a cover for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. Pretty easy to clean and it comes with a blade protector to keep from cutting yourself accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonL

customer_reviews.title: A must item for frequent homemade pizzas
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a bit larger than 14 inch as it barely cuts the pizza made in 14" pan in one swift motion. But still beats cutting with the wheel cutter.
customer_reviews.author: ChiTown Sam

product_meta.title: Checkered Chef Pizza Cutter Sharp Rocker Blade With Cover. Heavy Duty Stainless Steel. Best Way To Cut Pizzas And More. Dishwasher Safe.
feature_bullets: You’ve never cut up a pizza this easily! The super sharp pizza cutter blade is designed for heavy use with little effort - in four simple cuts you’ve got eight perfect slices of pizza!

Safer and easier to store than any others of its kind. Keep your super sharp blade protected by storing your pizza cutter in the specially designed plastic sheath/holster included - safer for the blade and your fingers!
Never lose your pizza topping again - Checkered Chef’s rocker style pizza cutter slices through with ease without pushing toppings off like roller cutters do.

No where for germs to hide. Constructed from one solid piece of commercial quality 18/0 stainless steel with no wooden handle, making it more hygienic and dishwasher safe too! High quality stainless steel construction also makes this mezzaluna pizza cutter rust free.

Not just a pizza cutter! Chop, slice, mince and scoop, you’ll find so many uses for Checkered Chef Pizza Cutter in your kitchen, from cutting herbs to slicing up bars and brownies, the possibilities are endless!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,042 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
